basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: I am a professional who designs, builds, and maintains websites or web applications. I take the sole responsibility for transforming the client's vision into a functional and engaging digital product.
basics.objective: Eager to expand my skill set through external trainings to help boost all major front desk KPIs. Hoping to leverage organizational skills to help ABC Corp introduce time-saving schemes for all executives.
